pages.text: $(9)Reflective Defenses$() is a shield enchantment.$(p)It causes all blocked attacks to inflict a portion of the damage back at the attacker.$(p)More specifically, 15% of the damage blocked is reflected back.
Reflected damage is transformed into magic damage.$(p)Sufficiently high levels of $(9)Reflective Defenses$() will inflict more than the original damage.
